would step down in Janauary. Satya Nadella , 43, has been with the company for 19 years and most recently led the engineering efforts in the Online Services Division, Microsoft said. In deciding who should take the business forward, we wanted someone with the right mix of leadership, vision and hard-core engineering chops, chief executive Steve Ballmer wrote in an email to company employees that Microsoft published. lead the pioneering technology company. "We have been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time," said Eric Schmidt in announcing the decision. By clarifying our individual roles we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. In my clear opinion, Larry Page is ready to lead and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come. " Larry Page credited Eric Schmidt with running the company "brilliantly while keeping the "headstrong founders" involved. " Eric Schmidt is a tremendous leader and I have learned innumerable lessons from him. His advice and efforts will be invaluable to me as I start in this new role
